subject: Simsonn VAM
description_text:
Hi, I can't setup the Haptic Reactor with SimHub, they don't appear in the
device list. I have the Simsonn Pro Plus Pedal Upgrade. 

What could be the problem? 

Thanks

 

Lucio Flavio Delmestre

conversations.body_text: Hi Ludelme,  SIMHUB will be releasing a new version soon. We can provide you with an internal test build in advance — it’s nearly identical to the upcoming official release.      https://drive.google.com/file/d/1QrSbAvCC5iyx9XgdRgSQV-hWpmDGkujc/view
